phrases: Hey, do not you think he was cute?
He is the kind of guy that you want to protect.
Yeah, and I made it, naturally.
You are pretty good with your hands!
But make sure you hide it when you are at school.
We do not want anyone to find out.
My today's lunch box is a 3 layer stacker times 2.
That is only a few of the impressions I can do!
I demand that the clubrooms be cleaned immediately!
W-What is this all of a sudden, Prez?
It is not sudden at all!
I have been telling you guys over and over again to clean,
It reeks so much that you can practically see it!
That is because you guys are just as filthy!
What is wrong with being filthy?
Anyways, we are all going to clean this place up this Saturday!
We do not want to be here until dark.
I bet you are not even going to give us time to eat, are you?
We will bring snacks, so could you clean?
We will make things like rice balls.
You were surrounded, so instinctively rushed in.
Thanks to you, it looks like the cleaning will get done.
But if you think about it, making snacks for that many people is...
The Student Council will do something about the snacks.
After all, the cleaning of the club house is a request brought to us.
I will do my best to make them!
I wonder if they would be satisfied with just one rice ball.
You were absent from school for several days, were not you?
Usui-san, if you were to have something for a snack, what would you like?
No, that is not what I meant.
Um, rice porridge is a little...
Nah, it can wait until Monday.
I wanted to discuss tomorrow's cleaning.
We would like to make snacks for them.
I will be here until late today, so can you head home first?
Vice Prez, can you come here?
You guys are totally buddies now.
You have totally become his girlfriend, have not you?
I do not really understand why you try to hide it.
Seriously, what are you talking about?
Who would ever date that perverted alien?!
So, you went to nurse and make rice porridge for him when you are not even his girlfriend?
How do you know about that?
It is because I owed him.
So I really had no choice.
Do not get the wrong idea.
Some people still do put love letters in shoe lockers, huh?
Can you go meet her for me?
She said she will be waiting for me in the 2nd year room.
Do not tell me you are still afraid of girls or something like that.
That is not the issue here.
Could you throw this away for me then?
Why do not you date her?!
If getting love letters is such a pain, then you should choose just one person.
Then I am sure fewer people will ask you out.
And, it seems like Prez is not very self-aware, but she is so...
What an interesting thing to say, Kanou-kun.
Is it annoying to watch from the sidelines?
I am not angry at you or anything.
I am just tired of this kind of thing.
It is a drag to even get serious about it.
You wore the maid uniform without permission again, did not you?
It is after hours, so what is the big deal?
I was supposed to stand in the middle.
Middle school kids need to go home.
We should get ready to go home, too.
How about we all grab a bite to eat together?
Do you know of a good place?
Hi, we are the kitchen sisters.
The rice related dishes did not get ordered as much as expected, so we had leftovers.
We made rice balls with the leftovers, so everyone, please dig in.
Looks like it will be dinner at Maid Latte.
If Misa-chan was here, we could have given her some to take home.
If I do this, it should harden...
Practicing making rice balls, I guess.
I cannot waste any more rice...
How about this for an idea?
You rip and roll the tissue to rice size, then damp them.
Okay, now I can work on them without hesitation!
Prez, you do not look very well.
It was keeping its shape by the morning, so I should be able to make them.
Split up into teams and get working on it!
I have got some free time.
Looks like Usui-senpai is not here.
Oh yeah, he is not here today.
What do you think of Prez and Usui-san?
No, that is not what I meant.
What are you asking about then, Kanou-kun?
Excel in both academics and sports.
They are like a different breed of people.
It is like they are living in another world.
I could help Prez if I could do everything, like Usui-san can.
I did not mean that in a dating sort of way or anything like that.
I am a bit short on veggies recently, you know.
You have all done a wonderful job.
What are these balls doing here?
It is a rice ball, Kanou.
It is nothing but a rice ball, right?
How about I eat one then.
But I hear a sound rice balls would never make.
Are you guys making progress with the cleaning?
Look, there is strange balls mixed in here.
You have all got some nerve.
You better be ready for this!
The athletic clubs are so courageous.
Why do not we clean the place up?
It is going to be my family's treasure!
I will take care of it for the rest of my life!
I wonder what this is made of.
They left after cleaning the place up.
I wish they could have done something about this, too.
Well, I guess it was impossible...
It is pretty horrible, I got to say.
This the result of a night of practice, huh?
That rice porridge was better than this.
Even he will not eat this.
You are in a league of your own, Ayuzawa.
I really do not get it.
Why do not you tell her how you feel if you care for her so much?
Why would you lie like that and keep yourself from pursuing her?
Where did those rice balls disappear to?
Why do you always come out of nowhere?
Am I? I am showing up normally.
Well, it is not like I come falling from the sky.
What kind of human falls from the sky?
What was I thinking, dropping precious food like that?!
This is Shintani Hinata-kun, transferring to our school today.
He was born in this area, but he is been in Kyuushuu for about 10 years.
Do not tell me you smell this.
You can have it, if you want it so badly.
You are such a good guy.
You cannot spoil him from day one, Sensei.
You have to make him abide by the rules.
Put the candy away for now.
Gosh, what is wrong with you?
You guys keep your mouth shut, too!
How many times do I have to tell you?
I told you not to eat while walking.
I get hungry, so I cannot help it.
Prez, I am sorry to bother you when you are busy.
Could you check the documents that will be distributed today during the meeting?
I will be holding onto these bread crusts for a while.
Is he really in high school?
Edit that portion, and add this line, and it will be okay.
Make copies for everyone and put it on the table for me.
Looked like you were glued to the transfer student.
I was lonely, since you would not look at me at all.
You did not look like you even wanted attention.
You did not show up at all.
But I was watching you the whole time.
You glanced back, did not you, Ayuzawa?
The transfer student is in trouble!
He is been surrounded by boys!
It looked dangerous, so we thought we needed to tell you.
Well, when we were here, it looked like a fight could start any moment.
Hey, guess what I have this time.
If you guess it right, I will give it to you.
How can you tell while the wrapper is not even open?
How do you not get fat when you eat so much?
No, I used to be totally fat when I was little.
But my parents died in a car accident when I was in elementary school, so I moved to Kyuushuu where my Gramps live.
It is totally out in the boonies where there are no snack stands at all.
I nibbled on veggies instead, and I naturally ended up like this.
But he told me he would not have enough land to make a profit while I am around, so I came back here, where I used to live.
Was not that actually supposed to be a pretty serious story?
How do you handle tuition and stuff?
I am managing with the money Dad and Mom left behind.
You have a pretty difficult life, do not you?
I thought he was some gluttonous airhead.
But he is so cheerful despite his rough background.
I came back to this city to meet my first love.
I figured that I would be able to meet her again, so I could not stop myself.
But I thought you just said you got kicked out by your grandfather.
I will come back when you are on the verge of death!
I am more worried about you than myself!
So you came back just to meet her?
So I will be busy looking for her!
I mean, she is kind, cheerful, and cares about others.
If I were to describe her, she is just like a beautiful flower that blooms in the middle of a field.
Oh, how I wish for you to feed me that sweet cake again.
I am coming to see you, so hang in there for me.
Is she even in this school to begin with?
Then how far are you going to go to search for her?
I promised that I would follow Misaki-chan for the rest of my life.
But that is what I promised I would do.
But, hey, does not Misaki ring a bell?
Do not go up the tree like that anymore.
I will follow you for the rest of my life.
Is the Misaki-chan he is talking about...
If so, would not they have recognized each other?
They have already spoken with each other quite a bit.
When I was in elementary school, there was a boy that everyone called Youkou.
Because the kanji of his name can be read like that.
He was a big glutton, and was really fat, too.
Then you used to date Hinata-kun?!
Why did you have to suggest that?!
I can see the entire campus from here.
How much of an idiot is he?
You cannot bother me if I am up here.
You are going to fall again!
If you do not come down from there immediately, I am going to confiscate the bread crusts and the candy!
I am sorry for you, but I have changed quite a bit from when we were little-
I never would have guessed that Shintani would be You-kun.
You have something you want to say?
It is good to eat bread crusts with sugar, but they are also great the way they are!
Where did you get those bread crusts from?!
It looks like he showed up just to get these confiscated.
I think he wanted your attention.
Now with a transfer student in the show, next week will be about Mountain School!
We will be going to a temple in the mountains.
